channel.title: After setting my paths, no compiles/runs will work
channel.description: I have tried every tutorial for setting paths, after the method I used to use on my old pc failed. And every single thing I tried, still comes up with the same result. "Javac is not recognized program." or Java. Neither my 'run' or my compiler will work. I have added my variables, I have updated java/removed old versions, nothing is working. I need help please. I am going to be starting school for programming next year, and I wanted to fiddle with a pserver as I self-teach to help myself get ahead. And I can't even get this source running. :(

item.title: After setting my paths, no compiles/runs will work
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

crimsonbow13:

Sure did Latest version 1.7.0_25 and nothing. Still NOTHING is working. I’ve been trying to figure this out on my own for 4 hours. And I’ve had to system restore 3 times from messing things up. I need somebody to teamview and help me or something I just wanna fittle around with things internal in the source, and I can’t even get it up.

Go ahead and pm me your team viewer id and pass.
I’ll look at it

Read full topic
